data.md:MetaData: Laser profiles of sea ice surface roughness during Polarstern cruise ARK-XI/1 in 1995 from flight Ark11_199508091239

Scientific Cruise Report of the Arctic Expedition ARK-XI/1 of the RV Polarstern in 1995 (German-Russian Project LADI: Laptev Sea - Arctic Deep Basin Interrelations) (Wissenschaftlicher Fahrtbericht über die Arktis-Expedition ARK-XI/1 von 1995 mit FS Polarstern)
